title.rendered: Surprise Celebrity Pregnancies NO ONE Saw Coming: Photos

content.rendered:
From Tori Spelling’s surprise pregnancy to those pesky Teen Moms and all their babies to Gal Gadot’s shocking new baby, surprise celebrity pregnancies happen all the time!

Some of the most surprising celebrity pregnancies absolutely no one – not even the celeb themselves! – saw coming. 

Scroll through the the gallery to relive some of the most shocking surprise celebrity pregnancies and see the mom’s rocking their baby bumps!

excerpt.rendered: From Tori Spelling’s surprise pregnancy to those pesky Teen Moms and all their babies to Gal Gadot’s shocking new baby, …

@graph.description: From Tori Spelling's surprise pregnancy to those pesky Teen Moms and all their babies to Gal Gadot's shocking new baby, surprise celebrity pregnancies

@graph.caption: arrives at the 43rd annual Academy Of Country Music Awards held at the MGM Grand Garden Nicole Kidman After years of battling through infertility treatments, Kidman divorced Tom Cruise (and Scientology), and moved onto Keith Urban, to whom she's been married for over a decade. The couple welcomed their first child Sunday Rose Kidman Urban in 2008, and their second, Faith Margaret Kidman Urban, in 2010. The power of no Scientology, woot!
